radiographic_examinations.findings: Drain projects over the right lower quadrant. Proximal small bowel is dilated up to 5.5 cm. Small bowel is aerated but less dilated in the right lower quadrant. There is air and even mild distension of the sigmoid. Air is also present in the transverse colon. No evidence of free air. Vertical staple line is present.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: There has apparently been an interval surgery with a staple line in the right lower quadrant.
